TestItem.Stem: According to paragraph 5, what is wrong with many of the studies Mischel reviewed?

Distractor_list.Distractor: They do not adequately consider that different personality traits might be highly correlated with each other.
They are based on a flawed idea of how to investigate the relation between personality traits and behaviors.
They are not consistent with each other in the way they determine trait test scores.
Their predictions about behavior are not satisfied by the results they actually obtained.
